channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Natural World
channel.desc: An intimate portrait of the spectacular Dragon Mountains of South Africa following giant antelope, bone-cracking vultures, and raucous baboons as they struggle to survive in this land of extremes. Serval cats and jackals patrol the slopes watching for any weakness and bearded vultures fly overhead. Eland antelope face constant challenges straight from birth, having to avoid wildfires, freezing rain and starvation.
